concept.title: AI Usage
concept.shortdesc: Discover how Artificial Intelligence (AI) was used in this project.

conbody.p: AI was an excellent learning partner and researcher on the Dweb stack. Copilots were used for programming tasks such as prototyping, refactoring code, rewriting existing functions, debugging and scanning through complex messages and logs. For content development, I wrote the content myself. Personally, I prefer my short, fact-based minimalism to the rambling, trippy Generative AI content.

ul.li: Provided concise summaries to help compare different dweb technologies
Up-to-date knowledge on latest dweb technology
Interactive learning partner when prompted with learning objectives
Used for prototyping Python and helped set up Github actions

strow.stentry: Open AI GPT-4o,GPT-4, GPT-3.5, GitHub Copilot, Anthropic Claude 3.5 Sonnet, VS Code Copilot, Microsoft Copilot

ul.li: Adding XML tagging with auto-complete in VS Code

strow.stentry: Open AI GPT-4o, GitHub Copilot, VS Code Copilot
